aboutme-intro.title: HomePageText
aboutme-intro.value: Hello, I'm Andrei, and I'm 24 years old. Here you'll find some details about me to get to know me better

aboutme-volunteer.title: AboutMeVolunteering
aboutme-volunteer.value: Volunteering in Student Union Romania from November 2018-present
aboutme-volunteer.value1: Volunteering in student association FIRESC at university 2018 - 2022
aboutme-volunteer.value2: Secretary in board at student association FIRESC 2019 - 2022
aboutme-volunteer.value3: Volunteering at Hard & Soft at Universitatea „Stefan cel Mare”
aboutme-volunteer.value4: Volunteering at VideoArt and UNICA festival 2016

aboutme-university.title: AboutMeUniversity
aboutme-university.value: I graduated from Stefan cel Mare University with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.
aboutme-university.value1: During university, I participated in a team project to redesign our public transport website. Following that, I had a group internship at ASSIST Software as a front-end developer. Later, I undertook an individual internship at the same company, further enhancing my front-end development skills. These experiences were crucial in shaping my career as a web developer.

aboutme-degree.title: AboutBachelorDeg
aboutme-degree.value: My bachelor degree consisted in the design of an intelligent system to control of a tarpaulin for terraces.
aboutme-degree.value1: The aim of the project was to develop and implement an embedded system aiming to automate and simplify a human action. The system uses a rain sensor to close or open the tarpaulins depending on the weather outside, a set of buttons for its manual operation and a mobile application for a remote control. For that I used a Raspberry Pi because I could use the multi‑Threading part and a wireless connection with the phone. To make the project I used Python and Thonny IDE for programming the Raspberry PI and for the mobile application I used Android Studio with Java.
